attributes.body:
Let's build the future together!

Teamtailor is an Employer Branding and an ATS SaaS platform used by over 6 000 companies, 200.000 users in 90 countries around the world üåè.

Working at Teamtailor means working at a young, international, and fast-paced tech company that offers an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organization and are craving for responsibilities. It also means having lots of fun ü•≥

Building a diverse team with various backgrounds and expertise is at the core of Teamtailor since its very beginning and is truly part of its strength today! There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success :

That's why we're expanding our Customer Success department and looking for a Customer Success Manager, who speaks French and English. Our mission is to have the most satisfied customers and we are looking for a strong relationship-builder to join our team üëäüèΩ

Within the Customer Success department you find Customer Success Managers, Product Specialists and Onboarding Specialists, who are located in Sweden, Finland, and the UK üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶

Your key responsibilities will be to:

  • Implement and onboard new customers
  • Help our customers use Teamtailor at full potential, with everything from integrations, best practice to training opportunities
  • Work proactively with renewals
  • Build strong relationships
  • Find new business opportunities with our existing customers, in the form of expansion sales, upselling/cross-selling.
  • Track customers accounts to identify churn risk and work actively to prevent that risk
  • Collect and analyze customers feedback and present internally
  • Together develop and improve ways of working with customer satisfaction

As a Customer Success Manager at Teamtailor you will be offered:

  • Incredible development opportunities
  • Responsibility for your own customer base
  • The opportunity to work with the market's best product
  • Fixed salary with commission structure
  • Be part of a great team

Is this you?

  • Experience within sales and technical customer support from the SaaS industry
  • Experience from the HR/Recruitment industry
  • A hobby "tech-savvy" person
  • Fluent in English & French
  • A ping pong professional üèì... we're kidding! But we do like to play

We value your personality and we believe you're passionate about your work, ambitious and work hard to reach your own goals!

Interested? üòÉ

attributes.body:
Let's build the future together!

Teamtailor is an Employer Branding and an ATS SaaS platform used by over 5.000 companies, 250.000 users in 90 countries around the world üåè

Working at Teamtailor means working at a young, international, and fast-paced tech company that offers an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organization and are craving for responsibilities. It also means having lots of fun ü•≥

Building a diverse team with various backgrounds and expertise is at the core of Teamtailor since its very beginning and is truly part of its strength today! There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success.

As a Sales & Business Developer, you will be our newest team member based in Stockholm and part of our existing international sales team which is currently made of 4 superstars: Reda, Minoo, Christian, Marta, Grant and Lluis.

As a Sales & Business Developer at Teamtailor you will be offered :

  • ‚ú® The opportunity to sell the market's leading employer branding and recruitment platform
  • üí∞ A fixed salary and a very generous commission model with no caps that reward people who are motivated and perform well
  • üöÄDevelopment opportunities in a fast-growing environment, continuous training, and support
  • üèù Paid holidays and the chance to attend our yearly 3-day company trip to a secret summer destination all covered by us
  • üçï Heaps of team events, celebrations, weekly competitions, rewards, and Pizza Fridays for those who like challenges
  • üéÅ A Starter kit which includes a Macbook Air, iPhone + Plan, the must-have Teamtailor outfit including a tote bag, t-shirt, hoodie...

We value your personality and passion!

For us, personality and passion come before education. Your difference is your strengths and you will always be supported and looked after by your Teamtailor family. You will have the responsibility for your own work, meaning that working remotely isn‚Äôt something you mind.

Additionally, we are looking for someone who :

  • üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Has previous experience in B2B sales (with SaaS platforms is a plus) and can be responsible for their entire sales cycle from prospecting to sales
  • üì£ Is comfortable in generating their own leads, prospecting via email, cold calling, or using other social networks such as LinkedIn, booking meetings, and conducting demos
  • üí™Has the will to push harder and keep high activity
  • ‚òÄÔ∏èHas a positive and caring attitude

If you are prepared for failure and ready for success, you know what to do üòâ

Good luck from your future colleagues üçÄ
attributes.title: Sales & Business Developer Benelux
attributes.pitch: Help us Paint Benelux Pink. Join one of Europe's fastest-growing SaaS companies! üöÄ

attributes.body:
Let's build the future together!

Teamtailor is an Employer Branding and an ATS SaaS platform used by over 6000 companies, 180.000 users in 90 countries around the world üåè.

Working at Teamtailor means working at a young, international, and fast-paced tech company that offers an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organization and are craving for responsibilities. It also means having lots of fun ü•≥

Building a diverse team with various backgrounds and expertise is at the core of Teamtailor since its very beginning and is truly part of its strength today! There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success :

As a üá´üá∑French-speaking Sales & Business Developer, you will be our new team member based in France and part of our existing French sales team based in Stockholm and Paris, which is currently made of 9 superstars: Matthieu, Baptiste, Julien, Lo√Øc, Anne, Edouard, Ma√´le and Lucille.

As a Sales & Business Developer at Teamtailor you will be offered :

  • ‚ú® the opportunity to sell the market's leading employer branding and recruitment platform
  • üí∞ a fixed salary and a very generous commission model with no caps that reward people who are motivated and perform well
  • üèÉüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è development opportunities in a fast-growing environment, continuous training, and support
  • üèù paid holidays and the chance to attend our yearly 3-day company trip to a secret summer destination all cover by us
  • üçæ tons of team events, celebrations, weekly competitions, rewards, and Pizza Friday for you who like challenges
  • üéÅ a starter kit which includes a Macbook Air, iPhone + Plan, the must-have Teamtailor outfit including a tote bag, t-shirt, sweater, hoodie...
  • üöÜ transport card coverage up to 50% (for colleagues in Paris region)
  • üç£ Swile card

We value your personality and passion!

For us, personality and passion come before education. Your difference is your strength and you will always be supported and looked after by your Teamtailor family. You will have the responsibility for your own work, meaning that working remotely isn‚Äôt something you mind.

Additionally, we are looking for someone who :

  • üá´üá∑ is fluent both in French and English
  • üë®üèª‚Äçüíª has previous experience in B2B sales (with SaaS platforms is a plus) and can be responsible for their entire sales cycle from prospecting to sales
  • üïµüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è is comfortable in generating their own leads, prospecting via email, cold calling, or using other social networks such as LinkedIn, booking meeting, and conducting demos
  • üí™has the will to push harder and keep high activity
  • ‚òÄÔ∏èhas a positive and caring attitude
  • üè°is living close to Paris by train (possible to be based in Stockholm too)

If this sounds like you, then you know what to do üòâ

Interview process :

If there is a match from the get-go, things can move really fast (some of our top performers have been hired in less than 3 weeks). The process usually includes these steps :

1) Introductory call / 10 - 20 minutes

2) Manager Interview / 1 hour

3) Study Case + Informal interview with part of the team / 1 hour

4) Potential exchange with rest of the team / 30 minutes

5) Quick call with the Head of Sales / 10 - 20 minutes

We look forward to receiving your application. Good luck from your future colleagues üçÄ
attributes.title: Sales & Business Developer France üá´üá∑

attributes.body:
Why work with us at Teamtailor Oceania?

Working at Teamtailor means working in a young, fast-moving HRTech startup and working with smart people that are passionate about their work.

We offer an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organization and are craving for responsibilities. We are a global team of over 200, our headquarters are based out of Stockholm, Sweden.

Here in New Zealand, we offer a hybrid way of working, with an option to work out of a world-class co-working space in Smales Farm, Takapuna.

There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success which means having lots of fun as we go! ü•≥

Who are you?

For us, personality and passion come before education. Your difference is your strengths and you will always be supported and looked after by your Teamtailor family.

Additionally, we are looking for someone who is fluent in English - but another language would be awesome too!

Have some previous experience in B2B sales and can be responsible for your entire sales cycle from prospecting to signing.

You may have experience in HR or Recruitment (internal or agency), tech (SaaS Platforms is a plus) this is an advantage as we speak directly with People teams when demoing Teamtailor and with this experience, you may be able to understand our customer's needs even better!

Be comfortable in generating your own leads, prospecting via email, cold calling, or using other social networks such as LinkedIn, booking meetings, and conducting demos. We use Hubspot as our CRM, as well as Notion and Slack too.

Have the will to push harder and keep high activity ü§ù

Have a positive and caring attitude üíñ


What we can offer you

  • A team culture that is inclusive & fun!
  • The opportunity to sell the market's most modern employer branding and recruitment applicant tracking system.
  • A fixed salary and a generous uncapped commission model that rewards people who are motivated and perform well.
  • Development opportunities in a fast-growing environment, continuous training, and support.
  • Paid holidays and the chance to attend our yearly 3-day company trip to a secret destination all covered by us ‚õ±
  • Do you like a challenge? Our local team loves a hard game of tennis, or maybe an outdoor Pilates class is more your style, as we grow we are creating our own local team events, & how we celebrate our successes üçæ
  • A Starter kit which includes a Macbook Air, iPhone + Plan, a must-have Teamtailor outfit including a tote bag, t-shirt, and caps üöÄ
  • Do you work better remotely? We offer a role with 100% freedom, which helps lead the team to perform, build the right culture & ability to balance your "life"

What do we do?

Teamtailor is changing the way companies work with employer branding and recruiting online. We offer our customers an Employer Branding and a Recruitment ATS (applicant tracking system) globally used by over 5000 companies, 150.000 users in 90 countries around the world üåè

Locally in New Zealand & Australia, we are already a much-loved platform by small to larger companies that are growing.

Listen below to one of our many HR Heroes and their journey with us üöÄ


Are you ready for this unique journey with us?

Send through your application, please don't miss our quick video question (it is optional) but just shows us that little 'extra' and your uniqueness üé•

Good luck from your future colleagues! See you hopefully soon üíñ
attributes.title: SaaS Sales Executive üá≥üáø

attributes.body:
Vil du v√¶re en del av Teamtailors satsning i Norge?

Har du ambisjoner? Brenner du for tech og innovative l√∏sninger? Vi er p√• jakt etter deg som √∏nsker √• hjelpe selskaper med √• omfavne endringer og l√∏se problemer p√• en smidig og smart m√•te.

Teamtailor ekspaneder og etablerer n√• et nytt team i Norge - du har mulighet til √• bli nummer 4 inn i teamet!

V√•r ambisjon er √• v√¶re markedsledende i Norge i l√∏pet av 2022.

Teamtailor endrer m√•ten selskaper jobber med Employer Brand og rekruttering. Det √• jobbe i Teamtailor betyr √• jobbe i et ungt og voksende tech-selskap med ivrige mennesker som er lidenskapelig opptatt av jobben sin.

Teamet v√•rt har erfaring fra selskaper som Skype og Mynewsdesk, derfor har vi god erfaring med √• "forstyrre" bransjer!

Du kan lese mer om v√•rt produkt her, ellers kan du se eksempler p√• noen av v√•re kunder: Foodora, Daniel Wellington & Mesta (ja, alt du ser her er v√•rt produkt, ja det er ogs√• ganske bra).


Hva kan vi tilby?

  • Muligheten til √• selge en markedsledende helhetsl√∏sning for Employer Brand og automatisert rekruttering
  • Muligheten til √• v√¶re nr 4 (!) inn i det nye norske teamet i Oslo der du vil ha store innflytelsesmuligheter
  • En levende arbeidsplass med store utviklingsmuligheter
  • Et dyktig og mangfoldig team som alltid er st√∏ttende og hjelpsom
  • En fast l√∏nn og en (veldig) sjener√∏s provisjonsmodell

Hvem er du?

  • Du har erfaring med B2B
  • Du har ambisjoner og gir deg ikke f√∏r jobben er gjort
  • Du er komfortabel med √• holde presentasjoner og booke m√∏ter over telefon
  • Du er en person som tar eierskap for ditt eget budsjett og dine m√•l
  • Kan opprettholde h√∏y aktivitet, motivere og utfordre deg selv
  • Du prater flytende norsk og er komfortabel med √• kommunisere p√• Engelsk

Vil du se hele salgsstyrken hos Teamtailor? Her er en rask oversikt fra salgskonferansen v√•r i 2020üëáüèº



Teamtailor vokser raskt og vi gleder oss til √• m√∏te deg. S√∏k n√•, s√• tar vi kontakt!
attributes.title: Account Manager
attributes.pitch: Bli en del av et av Europas raskest voksende SaaS-selskaper. Her blir du en del av et internasjonalt team med kolleger over hele verden. Er du klar for √• sette Teamtailor p√• verdenskartet?

attributes.body:
Let's build the future together!

Teamtailor is an Employer Branding and an ATS SaaS platform used by over 6000 companies, 180,000 users in 90 countries around the world üåè.

Working at Teamtailor means working at a young, international, and fast-paced tech company that offers an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organisation, whilst having lots of fun ü•≥

Building a diverse team with various backgrounds and expertise is at the core of Teamtailor and is something we are looking to further strengthen in 2022! There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success.

As an AE at Teamtailor you will be offered :

  • ‚ú® the opportunity to sell the market's leading employer branding and recruitment platform
  • üí∞ a fixed salary and a generous commission model with no caps that reward people who are motivated and perform well. Estimated OTE of ¬£100,000 and hopefully more! ü§©
  • üå¥ 33 days paid holidays including bank holidays
  • üèÉüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è development opportunities in a fast-growing environment, continuous training, and support
  • üõ• The chance to attend our yearly 3-day company trip to a secret summer destination all covered by us!
  • üçæ frequent team events, celebrations, weekly incentives and Pizza Friday
  • üéÅ a starter kit which includes a Macbook Air, iPhone + Plan, the must-have Teamtailor outfit including a tote bag, t-shirt, sweater, hoodie...
  • üíú Calm app subscription, flexible working budget and cycle to work scheme

We value your personality and passion!

For us, personality and passion come before education. Your difference is your strength and you will always be supported and looked after by your Teamtailor family. You will have the responsibility for your own work, and a choice to work in the office or remotely.

Desirable but not required:

  • üë®üèª‚Äçüíª has previous experience in B2B sales (with SaaS platforms is a plus) and can be responsible for their entire sales cycle from prospecting to sales
  • üïµüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è is comfortable in generating their own leads, prospecting via email, cold calling, or using other social networks such as LinkedIn, booking meeting, and conducting demos
  • üí™has the will to push harder and keep high activity
  • ‚òÄÔ∏èhas a positive and caring attitude
  • üè°living close to London to join our Soho office

If this sounds like you, then you know what to do üòâ

We look forward to receiving your application. Good luck from your future colleagues ü§û
attributes.title: Account Executive
attributes.pitch: Join one of Europes fastest growing companies where you can really make your mark and help shape the landscape. Have fun with over 150 amazing colleagues and over 180,000 happy users üöÄ

attributes.body:
Here at Teamtailor, we are committed to turning HR into Heroes üéâ We strive to change the way people are getting hired all across the globe, focusing on amazing experiences and making recruitment fun and innovative. 2020 has been an incredible year for Teamtailor. We were named in Deloitte‚Äôs Technology Fast 50 for the 3rd year in a row, making us one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe! Despite these incredible achievements, we‚Äôre far from finished üöÄ

Read more about our product at teamtailor.com. Or why not look at some live examples: Epidemic sound, Daniel Wellington, Lifesum, and Tradera (yes, everything you see there is our product and yes it's amazing).

As we grow in number of customers and employees, the complexity of internal systems and processes also increases. We‚Äôre now looking for another Integration Developer to help us optimize the integrations and processes related to our internal systems.

As an Integration Developer at Teamtailor - you will

  • Create tools that can assist colleagues across the organisation by improving efficiency in workflows
  • Have the freedom to choose the tools you like and shape the tech stack we use
  • Build integrations by using web APIs to connect internal systems (with main focus on systems for managing customer relations such as Hubspot, Planhat, Intercom), to achieve automation of data flows between these internal systems
  • Work with other fun projects with a technical aspect
  • Be part of a great team üíï

Your team

You will, together with David, be part of a star team of two developers with focus on internal integrations and automations. The team reports directly to CFO and is part of a larger Finance team. While in this role, you will have colleagues at Sales, Customer Success and Customer Support as the key stakeholders as you would focus on systems that handels customer relations such as Hubspot, Planhat and Intercom. Of course you will also always work close to and have our colleagues at Product to bounce ideas with! üôå

Is this you?

  • A passionate coder with skills such as Node.js, Ruby or Python;
  • Enjoy making others‚Äô lives easier through building integrations between systems and automizing repeatitive tasks and work flows;
  • Good communication skills in English both written and spoken;
  • Self-driven and can concretise requirements/specifications from a technical perspective and implement solutions;
  • You are either a software developer with a couple of years of work experience in programing; or a driven, ambitious newly graduated student in computer science or similar, and this might be a great fit for you to jump start your career;
  • A small portfolio on Github with hobby projects is a merit.


Other cool stuff we offer you!

  • Yearly company retreats/kick-offs in the sun.
  • Amazing extracurricular activities such as workouts, great food, and fun games!


If the above describes you well, we are looking forward to getting to know you!


Or, know someone who would be a perfect fit? Let them know!?
attributes.title: Developer - Integrations
attributes.pitch: Join us as our Integration Developer and be the hero who makes other colleagues' lives easier!

attributes.body:

Building a diverse team with various backgrounds and expertise is at the core of Teamtailor since its very beginning and is truly part of its strength today! There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success!

attributes.pitch: We value your personality and passion! Join a hyper-growth scale-up where you‚Äôll be able to work on a huge variety of projects and benefit from rapid development opportunities. üéâ

attributes.body:
P√• Teamtailor jobber vi for √• forandre og forbedre rekruttering. Vi streber etter √• forbedre kandidatopplevelsen, i tillegg til √• gj√∏re rekruttering morsomt og innovativt. Siden 2014 har vi strebet etter √• gj√∏re HR til helter!


Vi er p√• en utrolig spennende reise. 2020 ble tredje √•ret p√• rad der vi igjen blir nevnt i Deloittes Technology fast 50 som et av Europas raskest voksende teknologiselskaper i 2021. I 2021 ble vi ogs√• nevnt i Financial Times' √•rlige liste som et av Europast raskest voksende selskaper. Til tross for dette har vi bare s√• vidt begynt! üöÄ


Det √• jobbe p√• Teamtailor inneb√¶rer at du jobber i et ungt og voksende teknologiselskap med over 180 smarte og engasjerte medarbeidere spredt over hele verden. Vi √•pner n√• i Oslo og s√∏ker deg som er ute etter en ny utfordring i din karriere, der du kan vokse raskt og samtidigt f√• v√¶re med p√• en heftig reise. S√∏k p√• stillingen og connect med v√•r fantastiske gjeng!‚≠êÔ∏è


Teamet vi bygger i Oslo kommer vil spille en viktig og sentral rolle i Teamtailor's fortsatte vekstreise.

Om rollen

I rollen som SDR kommer du til √• ha ansvar for √• finne nye kundeprospekter og skape nye salgsmuligheter.

Du kommer f√∏rst og fremst til √• jobbe systematiskt med kundebehandling innenfor B2B, med blant annet telefon og mail som arbeidsverkt√∏y, der hensikten er √• booke m√∏ter med potensielle kunder for v√•re Sales & Business Developers.

Dette er en ny rolle p√• Teamtailor, derfor vil du v√¶re delaktig i utformingen av arbeidsmetoder og strukturer. Du kommer i tillegg til √• ha et tett samarbeid med Teamtailor's √∏vrige selgere og sammen vil dere tilby en kundeopplevelse utenom det vanlige for v√•re kunder.

Vi s√∏ker deg som:

  • Er konkurranseinnstilt med stort fokus p√• resultat
  • Elsker salg og kundekontakt
  • Drives av √• skape nye kunderelasjoner

attributes.pitch: Bli en del av et av Europas raskest voksende Saas-selskaper, du f√•r ogs√• muligheten til √• v√¶re med √• bygge et team fra scratch üöÄ

attributes.body:
Let's build the future together!

Teamtailor is an Employer Branding and an ATS SaaS platform used by over 5.000 companies, 250.000 users in 90 countries around the world üåè

Working at Teamtailor means working at a young, international, and fast-paced tech company that offers an ideal workplace for those who want to have a real impact on the growth of an organization and are craving for responsibilities. It also means having lots of fun ü•≥

Building a diverse team with various backgrounds and expertise is at the core of Teamtailor since its very beginning and is truly part of its strength today! There are no typical profiles, each and every team member shares our vision and wants to be part of its success.

As a Sales & Business Developer, you will be our newest team member based in Stockholm and part of our existing international sales team which is currently made of 4 superstars: Reda, Minoo, Christian, Marta, Grant and Lluis.

As a Sales & Business Developer at Teamtailor you will be offered :

  • ‚ú® The opportunity to sell the market's leading employer branding and recruitment platform
  • üí∞ A fixed salary and a very generous commission model with no caps that reward people who are motivated and perform well
  • üöÄDevelopment opportunities in a fast-growing environment, continuous training, and support
  • üèù Paid holidays and the chance to attend our yearly 3-day company trip to a secret summer destination all covered by us
  • üçï Heaps of team events, celebrations, weekly competitions, rewards, and Pizza Fridays for those who like challenges
  • üéÅ A Starter kit which includes a Macbook Air, iPhone + Plan, the must-have Teamtailor outfit including a tote bag, t-shirt, hoodie...

We value your personality and passion!

For us, personality and passion come before education. Your difference is your strengths and you will always be supported and looked after by your Teamtailor family. You will have the responsibility for your own work, meaning that working remotely isn‚Äôt something you mind.

Additionally, we are looking for someone who :

  • üåé Is fluent in both English and Italian
  • üë®üèª‚Äçüíª Has previous experience in B2B sales (with SaaS platforms is a plus) and can be responsible for their entire sales cycle from prospecting to sales
  • üì£ Is comfortable in generating their own leads, prospecting via email, cold calling, or using other social networks such as LinkedIn, booking meetings, and conducting demos
  • üí™Has the will to push harder and keep high activity
  • ‚òÄÔ∏èHas a positive and caring attitude

If you are prepared for failure and ready for success, you know what to do üòâ

Good luck from your future colleagues üçÄ
